</div>
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">F - 25</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Glossary of Certain
Mining Terms</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">ADIT</font> : 
An opening driven horizontally into the side of a mountain or hill for providing
access to a mineral deposit.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">ALTERATION</font> : Any physical or chemical change in a rock or mineral 
subsequent to its formation. Milder and more localized than 
metamorphism.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">ANTICLINE:</font> A fold with strata sloping downward on both sides from a
common crest.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">ASSAY</font> :
A chemical test performed on a sample of ores or minerals to determine the 
amount of valuable metals contained.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">BASALT:</font>
An extrusive volcanic rock composed primarily of plagioclase, pyroxene and some 
olivine.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">BASE 
METAL</font> : Any non-precious metal (e.g. copper, lead, zinc, nickel, 
etc.).</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">BRECCIA</font>
: A rock in which angular fragments are surrounded by a mass of fine-grained 
minerals.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">CORE</font> : 
The long cylindrical piece of rock, about an inch in diameter, brought to 
surface by diamond drilling.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">CROSSCUT</font> : A horizontal opening driven from a shaft and (or near) 
right angles to the strike of a vein or other ore body.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">DEVELOPMENT</font> : Work carried out for the purpose of opening up a 
mineral deposit and making the actual ore extraction possible.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">DIAMOND 
DRILL:</font> A rotary type of rock drill that cuts a core of rock that is 
recovered in long cylindrical sections, two centimeters or more in 
diameter.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">DILUTION</font> : (mining) Rock that is, by necessity, removed along with 
the ore in the mining process, subsequently lowering the grade of the 
ore.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">DIP:</font> 
The angle at which a vein, structure or rock bed is inclined from the horizontal
as measured at right angles to the strike.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">DRIFT</font> :
A horizontal underground opening that follows along the length of a vein or rock
formation as opposed to a cross-cut which crosses the rock 
formation.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">DUE
DILIGENCE:</font> The degree of care and caution required before making a 
decision; loosely, a financial and technical investigation to determine whether 
an investment is sound.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">EXPLORATION:</font> Work involved in searching for ore, usually by 
drilling or driving a drift.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">GALENA</font> : Lead sulphide, the most common ore mineral of 
lead.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">GEOPHYSICAL 
SURVEY</font> : Indirect methods of investigating the subsurface geology using 
the applications of physics including electric, gravimetric, magnetic, 
electromagnetic, seismic, and radiometric principles.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">F - 26</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<br>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><!--EFPlaceholder--><font
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Table of 
Contents</font></font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">GOSSANOUS:</font> Having the properties of gossan, an intensely oxidized, 
weathered or decomposed rock, usually the upper and exposed part of an ore 
deposit or mineral vein.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">GRABEN:</font>
A downfaulted block of rock.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">GRAB 
SAMPLE:</font> A sample from a rock outcrop that is assayed to determine if 
valuable elements are contained in the rock. A grab sample is not intended to be
representative of the deposit, and usually the best-looking material is 
selected.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">GRADE:</font> 
The average assay of a ton of ore, reflecting metal content.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">HIGH 
GRADE:</font> Rich ore. As a verb, it refers to selective mining of the best ore
in a deposit.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">LEVEL:</font> 
The horizontal openings on a working horizon in a mine; it is customary to work 
mines from a shaft, establishing levels at regular intervals, generally about 50
meters or more apart.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">LIMESTONE:</font> A bedded, sedimentary deposit consisting chiefly of 
calcium carbonate.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">LODE:</font> A
mineral deposit in solid rock.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">METALLIFERROUS:</font> Containing metal.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">METASEDIMENTS:</font> Sediment or sedimentary rock that shows evidence of 
having been subjected to metamorphism.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">MINERAL:</font> A naturally occurring homogeneous substance having 
definite physical properties and chemical composition and, if formed under 
favorable conditions, a definite crystal form.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">MINERAL 
RESOURCE</font> : A deposit or concentration of natural, solid, inorganic or 
fossilized organic substance in such quantity and at such grade or quality that 
extraction of the material at a profit is currently or potentially 
possible.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">MINERALIZATION</font> : The presence of potentially economic minerals in a
specific area or geological formation.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">NET SMELTER 
RETURN:</font> A share of the net revenues generated from the sale of metal 
produced by a mine.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">OPEN 
PIT:</font> A mine that is entirely on surface. Also referred to as open-cut or 
open-cast mine.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">ORE</font> : 
Material that can be mined and processed at a positive cash flow.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">OREBODY:</font> A natural concentration of valuable material that can be 
extracted and sold at a profit.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">PATENT</font> : The ultimate stage of holding a mineral claim in the 
United States, after which no more assessment work is necessary because all 
mineral rights have been earned.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">PATENTED 
MINING CLAIM:</font> A parcel of land originally located on federal lands as an 
unpatented mining claim under the General Mining Law, the title of which has 
been conveyed from the federal government to a private party pursuant to the 
patenting requirements of the General Mining Law.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">PROSPECT:</font> A mining property, the value of which has not been 
determined by exploration.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">F - 27</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<br>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><!--EFPlaceholder--><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Table of 
Contents</font></font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">PROBABLE 
RESERVES:</font> Resources for which tonnage and grade and/or quality are 
computed primarily from information similar to that used for proven reserves, 
but the sites for inspection, sampling and measurement are farther apart or are 
otherwise less adequately spaced. The degree of assurance, although lower than 
that for proven reserves, is high enough to assume continuity between points of 
observation.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">PROVEN 
RESERVES:</font> Resources for which tonnage is computed from dimensions 
revealed in outcrops, trenches, workings or drill holes and for which the grade 
and/or quality is computed from the results of detailed sampling. The sites for 
inspection, sampling and measurement are spaced so closely and the geologic 
character is so well defined that size, shape, depth and mineral content of 
reserves are well established. The computed tonnage and grade are judged to be 
accurate, within limits which are stated, and no such limit is judged to be 
different from the computed tonnage or grade by more than 20%.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">PYRITE:</font>
A yellow iron sulphide mineral, normally of little value, sometimes referred to 
as "fool's gold".</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">PYRITIC:</font> A brass-colored mineral, FeS2, occurring widely and used 
as an iron ore and in producing sulfur dioxide for sulfuric acid.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">RECLAMATION</font> : The restoration of a site after mining or exploration
activity is completed.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">RESERVES:</font> That part of a mineral deposit which could be 
economically and legally extracted or produced at the time of the reserve 
determination. Reserves are customarily stated in terms of &#8220;Ore&#8221; 
when dealing with metalliferous minerals.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">RESOURCE:</font> The calculated amount of material in a mineral deposit, 
based on limited drill information.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">ROYALTY:</font> An amount of money paid at regular intervals by the lessee
or operator of an exploration or mining property to the owner of the ground. 
Generally based on a certain amount per ton or a percentage of the total 
production or profits. Also, the fee paid for the right to use a patented 
process.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">SAMPLE:</font>
A small portion of rock or a mineral deposit, taken so that the metal content 
can be determined by assaying.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">SCHIST</font> 
- A foliated metamorphic rock the grains of which have a roughly parallel 
arrangement; generally developed by shearing.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">SERICITIZED:</font> Fine grained mica, similar to muscovite, illite, or 
paragonite.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">SHAFT:</font> 
A vertical or steeply inclined excavation for the purpose of opening and 
servicing a mine. It is usually equipped with a hoist at the top which lowers 
and raises a conveyance for handling personnel and materials.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">SHEAR OR 
SHEARING:</font> The deformation of rocks by lateral movement along numerous 
parallel planes, generally resulting from pressure and producing such 
metamorphic structures as cleavage and schistosity.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">SILICA</font> : Silicon dioxide. Quartz is a common example.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">SILICEOUS:</font> A rock containing an abundance of quartz.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">SILICIZED:</font> Conversion of something into, or the reaction of 
something with, silica.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">F - 28</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<br>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY:
Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><!--EFPlaceholder--><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Table of 
Contents</font></font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">SPHALERITE:</font> A zinc sulfide mineral; the most common ore mineral of 
zinc.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">STRIKE:</font>
The direction, or bearing from true north, of a vein or rock formation measured 
on a horizontal surface.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">SULFIDE:</font> A compound of sulfur and some other element.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">TAILINGS:</font> Material rejected from a mill after more of the 
recoverable valuable minerals have been extracted.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">TREND:</font> 
The direction, in the horizontal plane, or a linear geological feature (for 
example, an ore zone), measured from true north.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">UNPATENTED 
MINING CLAIM</font> : A parcel of property located on federal lands pursuant to 
the General Mining Law and the requirements of the state in which the unpatented
claim is located, the paramount title of which remains with the federal 
government. The holder of a valid, unpatented lode mining claim is granted 
certain rights including the right to explore and mine such claim under the 
General Mining Law.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT:
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">VEIN:</font> A
mineralized zone having a more or less regular development in length, width and 
depth which clearly separates it from neighboring rock.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WASTE:</font> 
Barren rock in a mine, or mineralized material that is too low in grade to be 
mined and milled at a profit.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">XENOLITH</font> : A fragment of country rock enclosed in an intrusive 
rock.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block">&#160;</div>
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">F - 29</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>

<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;<a name="FIS_CERTIFICATION"><!--
EFPlaceholder--></a></font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">CERTIFICATIONS</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">I, Jason Castenir <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">,</font> certify that:</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-
FAMILY: arial">
<tr>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">1.</font></div>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="92%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">I have reviewed this report on Form 10-K of First Colombia Gold
Corp.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
</td>
</tr><tr>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">2.</font></div>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="92%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue 
statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make 
the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements 
were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this 
report.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-
FAMILY: arial">
<tr>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">3.</font></div>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="92%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other 
financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material 
respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the 
registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
</td>
</tr><tr>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">4.</font></div>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="92%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer(s) and I are 
responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures 
(as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control 
over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-
15(f)) for the registrant and have:</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-
FAMILY: arial">
<tr>
<td align="right" valign="top" width="6%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">a.</font></div>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="89%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused 
such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to
ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its 
consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, 
particularly during the period in which this report is being 
prepared;</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-
FAMILY: arial">
<tr>
<td align="right" valign="top" width="6%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">b.</font></div>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="89%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or 
caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our 
supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of 
financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external 
purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting 
principles;</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-
FAMILY: arial">
<tr>
<td align="right" valign="top" width="6%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">c.</font></div>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="89%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#8217;s 
disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions 
about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end
of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-
FAMILY: arial">
<tr>
<td align="right" valign="top" width="6%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">d.</font></div>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="89%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#8217;s 
internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the 
registrant&#8217;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#8217;s fourth 
fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or
is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#8217;s internal 
control over financial reporting; and</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-
FAMILY: arial">
<tr>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="4%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">5.</font></div>
</td>
<td align="left" colspan="2" valign="top" width="92%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
1.8pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The registrant&#8217;s other certifying officer(s) and I have 
disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over 
financial reporting, to the registrant&#8217;s auditors and the audit committee 
of registrant&#8217;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent 
functions):</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
1.8pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
</td>
</tr><tr>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="4%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160; </font></td>
<td align="right" valign="top" width="3%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">a.</font></div>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="89%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the 
design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are
reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#8217;s ability to record, 
process, summarize and report financial information; and</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-

<tr>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT:

FONT-SIZE: 10pt">b.</font></div>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="89%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.8pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or
other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#8217;s internal 
controls over financial reporting.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT:

0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;

0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;

2002</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">In connection with the Annual Report of First Colombia Gold 
Corp. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 
2014 as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof 
(the &#8220;Report&#8221;), I, JAson Castenir, Chief Executive Officer and Chief
Accounting Officer of the Company, certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. &#167; 1350, 
as adopted pursuant to &#167;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that to the 
best of my knowledge:</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
